select count(*) from course where courseCode = #{courseCode}
mapper.insert: insert into COURSE(courseCode, categoryCode, cousreName, cousrePrice, cousreTeacher, cousreImg, cousreVideo, cousreTerm) values(#{courseCode},#{categoryCode},#{cousreName},#{cousrePrice},#{cousreTeacher},#{cousreImg},#{cousreVideo},#{cousreTerm})
mapper.update: update course set categoryCode = #{categoryCode}, cousreName = #{cousreName}, cousrePrice = #{cousrePrice}, cousreTeacher = #{cousreTeacher}, cousreImg = #{cousreImg}, cousreVideo = #{cousreVideo}, cousreTerm = #{cousreTerm} where courseCode =#{courseCode}
mapper.select: select c.coursecode, c.categorycode, c.cousreName, c.cousreprice, c.cousreteacher, c.cousreterm from course c join courseorder co ON c.coursecode = co.coursecode where co.userid = #{userId}
